name: Infinity Wings - Scout & Grunt
description: Infinity Wings - Scout & Grunt Take control of your chosen fighter (either Scout or Grunt) in this side scrolling shooter.
minimum_requirements: OS: WINDOWS XP / WINDOWS VISTA / WINDOWS 7 / WINDOWS 8 / WINDOWS 10 Processor: Any 64 or 32 bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: So great game !  I love the Space ship games, and this is frenetic! have a lot of fun, nice graphics, good sound, good controls!  Is a perfect ShootEmUp.  I recommend it, Cost is cheap, and have T.Cards!

its not the last stars wars 3d vr game but its a fine indie shooter.  Things I dont like is the option to see leaderboard... its open a web link to the developper page. I think they include it in the game.  there is so big boss (mothership) to destroy, some are pretty difficult.  Game play fine on my computer. (dualcore, 8go and windows 10)
